summary: THERE IS PROBLEM WITH THE IGNITION.  IF I TAKE MY KEY OUT THE MECHANISM LOCKS, THE STEERING WHEEL LOCKS AND I CAN'T GET THE CAR STARTED AGAIN.  I HAVE BEEN STRANDED SEVERAL TIMES AND HAVE STARTED LEAVING THE KEY IN THE IGNITION ALL THE TIME.  I KNOW THAT I AM NOT THE ONLY ONE HAVING THIS PROBLEM  I TOOK IT TO THE DEALERSHIP AND THEY SAID THE MECHANISM HAS GONE BAD AND I WOULD HAVE TO PAY TO HAVE IT REPLACED BECAUSE IT'S NOT COVERED UNDER THE WARRANTY.  THAT MEANS HAVING 2 DIFFERENT KEYS FOR THE CAR.  *TR
